amendment.description: An amendment numbered 100 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit the use of funds to promulgate new major rules if the Office of Management and Budget determines that the regulation is likely to result in a significant impact on the economy, a major increase in prices for consumers, or adverse effects on American global competition.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.
